titles.title: ADS for Mental Health Services Act
Advancing Digital Support for Mental Health Services Act
ADS for Mental Health Services Act
Advancing Digital Support for Mental Health Services Act
ADS for Mental Health Services Act
A bill to require covered digital advertising platforms to report their public service advertisements.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cruz with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 119-32.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 102.
